sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均表示事物的"混乱"状态。
means: confusion ： 指东西搅混在一起，凌乱得难以辨认；也可指思想混乱，以致无法进行正常的思维活动。
disorder ： 正式用词，含义广泛。指事物因失去原有的秩序而造成混乱；也可指社会中的动乱或骚乱。
disturbance ： 主要指社会中政治性的动乱、骚乱；也可指个人或少数人的闹事。
mess ： 语气强，口语中较常用的非正式用词。指既混乱又肮脏，尤指人思想混乱或外表不整洁。
chaos ： 着重指令人无能为力或感到绝望的混乱状态。突出没有很好的组织。

word_mean: 精神混乱，精神错乱：与时间、地点和个人有关的紊乱，有时伴有意识紊乱
意识模糊处于一种似睡似醒的状态，意识内容异常，也称精神错乱。

sentence.Network_en: His mind was a haze of fear and confusion.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于害怕和困惑，他当时处于一种混沌状态。

sentence.Network_en: Use different colours of felt pen on your sketch to avoid confusion.
sentence.Network_cn: 用不同颜色的毡头笔画草图，以免搞混。

sentence.Network_en: His people had fallen further and further into a quagmire of confusion.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的人民在混乱不安的泥潭里越陷越深。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... confuse v 使混乱 confusion n 混乱 diffuse v 散播.
大英语B级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... confused adj. 困惑的 confusion n. 混乱,混淆 congratulation n. 祝词,贺辞.
大学英语四级考试大纲 - 豆丁网 ... confuse vt. 使混乱，混淆 confusion n. 混乱；骚乱；混淆 congratulation n. 祝贺；祝贺词.
意识模糊（confusion）：往往伴有意识混浊，记忆障碍，注意力涣散，对周围事物漠不关心，对复杂事物难以识别和难于理解，时间 …

list.abs: insignificant中文 ... Gwin 葛温 ... 颠三倒四 confused disorderly 调兵遣将 move forces.
高中英语短语总汇 - 豆丁网 ... in condition( 健康情况良好), in confusion( 在混乱中), ,in court( 出庭).
角色混乱 （ Role Confusion ）：指在第五发展阶段，个人没有获得某种同一性的出现的一种状态。
confusion 干扰，混乱confusion reflector 干扰反射器congenerous 协同的，共同的

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin confusio(n-), from the verb confundere 'mingle together' (see confuse)

encyclopedia.content: 《Confusion》是陈冠希2010年的全新专辑，该专辑的主打单曲于2010年10月7日首次发行。2011年4月21日，该专辑正式在内地发行，种子音乐在北京举办记者会。

entry.tran: (尤指因想法不同造成的)困惑，不明确
entry.def: If  there is confusion about something, it is not clear what the true situation is, especially because people believe different things.

example.ex: There's still confusion about the number of casualties...
Omissions in my recent article must have caused confusion.
example.tran: 我最近一篇文章中的几处省略肯定造成了困惑。

entry.tran: (尤指因很多事情同时发生造成的)混乱局面，骚乱
entry.def: Confusion is a situation in which everything is in disorder, especially because there are lots of things happening at the same time.

example.ex: There was confusion when a man fired shots...
example.tran: 一个男子开了几枪，场面一片混乱。

example.ex: The rebel leader appears to have escaped in the confusion.
example.tran: 叛乱分子首领似乎已乘乱逃脱。

entry.def: If your mind is in a state of confusion, you do not know what to believe or what you should do.

example.ex: We always left his office in a state of confusion.
example.tran: 我们总是一头雾水地离开他的办公室。
青春期的种种压力和困惑

means.word_mean: 1. disorder resulting from a failure to behave predictably;
2. a mental state characterized by a lack of clear and orderly thought and behavior;
3. a feeling of embarrassment that leaves you confused
4. an act causing a disorderly combination of elements with identities lost and distinctions blended;

sentences.sentence: "the confusion of tongues at the Tower of Babel"

means.word_mean: 5. a mistake that results from taking one thing to be another;

sentences.sentence: "he changed his name in order to avoid confusion with the notorious outlaw"

auth_sentence.content: Confusion may be the only clue something is wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content: Confusion may be the only clue something is wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Confusion may be the only clue something is wrong.

auth_sentence.content: I'm in a state of turmoil and confusion .
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm in a state of turmoil and confusion .
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm in a state of turmoil and confusion .

auth_sentence.content: Our new confusion is just the same old confusion.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our new confusion is just the same old confusion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our new confusion is just the same old confusion.

Sentence.sentence: Social psychologist, John Roberts, finally cleared up the confusion about why people sometimes perform better and sometimes worse in front of an audience
These changes have cleared up much of the confusion and conflict that followed in the wake of 1976 legislation.

sentences.en: His answers to my questions have only added to my confusion.
sentences.cn: 他对我的问题的回答只是使我更加困惑不解。

sentences.en: There have been some of confusion names.

means.word_mean: 混乱, 骚乱，混乱状态

sentences.en: His unexpected arrival threw us into total confusion.
sentences.cn: 他的突然来访使我们完全不知所措。

sentences.en: In the ensuing confusion another eight persons were hurt.
sentences.cn: 在随后的骚动中, 又有八人受伤。

jushi.chinese: 在随后的骚动中,又有八人受伤。
